text: Va niz Alloh paziruft tavʙai on se tan (az ansoriho)-ro, ki az cang xonanisini karda ʙudand, to on goh ki zamin ʙo hamai kusodagijas ʙar onho tang sud va con dar tanason nameƣuncid (ʙa saʙaʙi aqiʙnisiniason az cang) va xud donistand, ki cuz Alloh hec panohgohe nadorand, ki ʙa on ruj ovarand. Pas, Alloh tavʙai ononro paziruft, to ʙa U ʙozojand, ki tavʙapaziru mehruʙon ast
